name: generate_metadata
description: Generates metadata for an image, including long caption, asset title and relevant keywords.

longcaption.description: A two or three sentences description of the image, elaborating on image content, context, and notable features.

assettitle.description: A very brief summary of the image, using 5 words or less.

googlekeywords.description: A list of relevant tags or keywords associated with the image.
